Articles.Content: So I'm trying to start my asteroid capture mission and decided to start small; grabbing an A class. but all I can find are C-E classes. How do I detect A classes?

U just gotta find em, they're there.

They spawn randomly
I mean are there any special criteria for the thing detecting them? Does it just spawn, is there a time thing, is there a range thing?
It spawns exactly the same as every other asteroid i.e randomly.
Yep, its random chance. Sometimes all you'll get is E class, sometimes you can't stop finding C classes.

Yeah, I've found the A's and B's spawn less frequently than the larger asteroids.

Which I guess kinda makes sense, since it's easier to find large objects in space vs smaller ones.
